result.name: customers-from-abroad-with-no-national-insurance-number
result.notes: Record of customers from abroad who make a claim to Pension Credit but have no National Insurance Number . The information included is Name, Address, and Date of Birth. Personal information is deleted as soon as a National Insurance Number is issued.

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Customers from abroad with no National Insurance Number

extras.value: Not due to be released. Contains personal data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
